summary.span: 會執行非對稱式加密和解密，方法是使用密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 所提供的 演算法實作。

span.span: Performs asymmetric encryption and decryption using the implementation of the algorithm provided by the cryptographic service provider (CSP).

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是預設的實作。This is the default implementation of . 遞增量為 8 位元支援從 384 位元到 16384 位元的金鑰大小，如果您有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝。The supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 如果您有 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider 安裝，它支援的從 384 位元到 512 位元的金鑰大小，其為 8 位元為增量單位。It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed. 有效金鑰大小會取決於使用的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)執行個體。Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the instance. Windows Csp 啟用金鑰之前的 Windows 版本 384 到 16384 位元為單位的大小[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]，和金鑰大小為 512 到 16384 位元[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]。Windows CSPs enable keys sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) Windows 文件中的函式。For more information, see [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function in the Windows documentation. ## 使用 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的互通性Interoperation with the Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI) 不同於 unmanaged CAPI 的 RSA 實作之後加密和解密之前加密位元組陣列的順序會反轉的類別。Unlike the RSA implementation in unmanaged CAPI, the class reverses the order of an encrypted array of bytes after encryption and before decryption. 根據預設，資料加密類別無法解密 CAPI`CryptDecrypt`函式，並以 CAPI 加密的資料`CryptEncrypt`方法無法解密類別。By default, data encrypted by the class cannot be decrypted by the CAPI `CryptDecrypt` function and data encrypted by the CAPI `CryptEncrypt` method cannot be decrypted by the class. 如果您不會彌補反向的排序的互通性的 Api，當類別會擲回。If you do not compensate for the reverse ordering when interoperating between APIs, the class throws a . 與 CAPI 交互操作，您必須以手動方式的順序反轉加密位元組之前加密的資料才能與其他 API。To interoperate with CAPI, you must manually reverse the order of encrypted bytes before the encrypted data interoperates with another API. 您可以呼叫，以輕鬆地反轉受管理的位元組陣列的順序方法。You can easily reverse the order of a managed byte array by calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來加密的位元組陣列的字串，並再回字串解密的位元組。The following code example uses the class to encrypt a string into an array of bytes and then decrypt the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會將匯出使用所建立的金鑰資訊成物件。The following code example exports the key information created using the into an object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不找到任何預設索引鍵，則會建立新的金鑰。If no default key is found, a new key is created. 這個建構函式會建立適合用來加密工作階段的金鑰組金鑰，讓它們可以安全地儲存並與其他使用者交換。This constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 產生的金鑰對應至使用產生的索引鍵`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來加密的位元組陣列的字串，並再回字串解密的位元組。The following code example uses the class to encrypt a string into an array of bytes and then decrypt the bytes back into a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立，或使用指定的金鑰容器會重複使用欄位`parameters`參數。This constructor creates or reuses a key container specified using the field of the `parameters` parameter. 根據預設，這個建構函式會建立適合用來加密工作階段的金鑰組金鑰，讓它們可以安全地儲存並與其他使用者交換。By default, this constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 產生的金鑰對應至使用產生的索引鍵`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 您可以建立金鑰組適用於驗證 （數位簽章） 的訊息或檔案，藉由設定欄位`parameters`參數來值。You can create a key pair suitable for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files by setting the field of the `parameters` parameter to the value. 這種類型的索引鍵對應至`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中所使用的值。This type of key corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. 如果您建立物件值指定，然後再建立另一個物件指定值，這兩個金鑰會放在單一容器，如果這兩個物件指定相同的金鑰容器名稱.If you create an object with the value specified and then create another object with the value specified, both keys will be placed in a single container if both objects specify the same key container name. 若要建立適用於相當熱衷式名稱簽署使用的索引鍵類別，您必須建立金鑰組。To create a key that is compatible with stong-name signing using the class, you must create a key pair. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件，會產生新的金鑰，並將它儲存到金鑰容器中。The following code example creates an object, generates a new key, and stores it in a key container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述支援的不同版本的 Microsoft Windows 和的最大長度的邊框距離`rgb`允許不同的作業系統與邊框間距的組合。The following table describes the padding supported by different versions of Microsoft Windows and the maximum length of `rgb` allowed by the different combinations of operating systems and padding. |與邊框距離Padding|支援的作業系統Operating System Supported|最大長度為 rgb 參數Maximum Length of rgb Parameter| |-------------|--------------------------------|-------------------------------------| |OAEP 填補 (PKCS #1 v2)OAEP padding (PKCS#1 v2)|Windows XP 或更新版本。Windows XP or later.|模數大小-2-2 \* hLen，其中 hLen 是雜湊的大小。Modulus size -2 -2\*hLen, where hLen is the size of the hash.| |直接加密 (PKCS #1 v1.5)Direct Encryption (PKCS#1 v1.5)|Microsoft Windows 2000 或更新版本使用高度加密套件安裝。Microsoft Windows 2000 or later with the high encryption pack installed.|模數大小-11。Modulus size - 11. （11 個位元組是填補可能最小值）。(11 bytes is the minimum padding possible.)| |指示不支援的加密和 OAEP 填補Direct Encryption and OAEP padding not supported|Microsoft Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition 或 Windows 2000 或更新版本，而不需要安裝的高度加密套件。Microsoft Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, or Windows 2000 or later without the high encryption pack installed.|允許的對稱金鑰的大小上限。The maximum size allowed for a symmetric key.| 使用解密此方法的結果。Use to decrypt the results of this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化物件的值 （另一個合作對象所傳送） 的公用金鑰，會產生工作階段金鑰 using演算法，然後加密工作階段金鑰使用物件。The following code example initializes an object to the value of a public key (sent by another party), generates a session key using the algorithm, and then encrypts the session key using the object. 使用這個機制，工作階段金鑰無法傳送回私密 RSA 金鑰的擁有者，而且兩個合作對象無法使用工作階段金鑰交換加密的資料。Using this scheme, the session key could be sent back to the owner of the private RSA key and the two parties could use the session key to exchange encrypted data. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遞增量為 8 位元支援從 384 位元到 16384 位元的金鑰大小，如果您有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝。The supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 如果您有 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider 安裝，它支援的從 384 位元到 512 位元的金鑰大小，其為 8 位元為增量單位。It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed. 有效金鑰大小會取決於使用的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)執行個體。Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the instance. Windows Csp 啟用金鑰大小為 384 到 16384 位元 Windows 版本早於[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]，和金鑰大小為 512 到 16384 位元[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]。Windows CSPs enable key sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) Windows 文件中的函式。For more information, see [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function in the Windows documentation. 類別不允許您變更使用的金鑰大小屬性。The class does not allow you to change key sizes using the property. 任何寫入這個屬性的值無法更新不會發生錯誤的屬性。Any value written to this property will fail to update the property without error. 若要變更金鑰的大小，請使用其中一個建構函式多載。To change the key size, use one of the constructor overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立使用驗證的數位簽章方法。This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the method. `halg`參數可以接受，則，或。The `halg` parameter can accept a , a , or a . 字串值可以是下列其中一項：The string value can be one of the following: - 物件識別碼 (OID) 易記名稱使用雜湊演算法，加密組態檔或 Crypto API OID 資料表中的一個註冊的名稱。The object identifier (OID) friendly name of the hash algorithm to use, either a name registered in the crypto config file or one in the Crypto API OID table. - OID 值。The OID value. OID 必須辨識的 Crypto API。The OID must be one recognized by the Crypto API. 例如，您可以使用 SignData （新位元組 [5]，"1.3.14.3.2.26"） 或 SignData 新位元組 [5] ("sha1"） 或 SignData （新位元組 [5]，"SHA1"）。For example, you could use SignData(new byte[5], "1.3.14.3.2.26") or SignData(new byte[5], "sha1"), or SignData(new byte[5], "SHA1"). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會簽署，並驗證資料。The following code example signs and verifies data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`相當於傳遞旗標設為物件。Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to passing the flag to a object. 屬性會套用至目前的應用程式定義域中，所有的程式碼，而物件僅適用於明確參考它的類別。The property applies to all code in the current application domain, whereas the object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it. 這些設定會模擬，或未載入其使用者設定檔的帳戶下執行時很有用。These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded. 設定會影響金鑰存放區位置才初始化不含任何參數。Setting affects the key store location only if is initialized with no parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件，並設定靜態屬性，以使用電腦金鑰存放區，而非使用者設定檔金鑰存放區。The following code example creates an object and sets the static property to use the machine key store instead of the user profile key store. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所產生的數位簽章方法。This method verifies the digital signature produced by the method. 取得從使用公用金鑰簽署，簽章的雜湊值驗證簽章，以及提供資料的雜湊值的值比較。The signature is verified by obtaining the hash value from the signature using the public key it was signed with, and comparing that value to the hash value of the provided data. `halg`參數可以接受，則，或。The `halg` parameter can accept a , a , or a . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來驗證簽章的方法。The following example shows how to use the method to verify a signature. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method.
